Race.SpecificTitle: PW Sales Tax Dist. -- 1% S&U Renewal - PC - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Sales Tax District Proposition
(1% Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Jefferson Sales Tax District ("District") of Jefferson Parish ("Parish") under the provisions of R.S. 47:338.52, 338.65, 338.67-338.78, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to renew the levy and collection of the one percent special sales and use tax ("Tax") presently levied by the District for an additional twenty years commencing December 2, 2022, with the amount reasonably expected to be collected in the first year being $78,632,786, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, replacing, improving and maintaining sewerage, road and drainage projects in the District; provided that the proceeds of the Tax collected within the presently constituted boundaries of each municipality within the District, except the Town of Jean Lafitte, be returned to said municipality to be used for any lawful purpose, with one-eighth of the Tax collected in the unincorporated area of the Parish to be given to the Jefferson Parish Sheriff for law enforcement, and with seven-eighths of the Tax collected in the unincorporated area of the Parish and all of the Tax collected within the Town of Jean Lafitte to be used by the District for the aforesaid purposes; and provided further that the proceeds of the Tax may be funded into bonds?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District No. 1 -- 4 Mills Renewal- SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall School District No. 1 of the Parish of Jefferson, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of four (4) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $13,900,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for giving additional support to the public elementary and secondary schools in the District, with the proceeds of said tax to be dedicated and expended only for the following purposes: (1) the proceeds of 1 mill of such tax levy shall be expended only for the continuation and expansion of the Technology Department to include additional personnel, acquiring and maintaining equipment and supplies for educational and instructional purposes; (2) the proceeds of 2 mills of such tax levy shall be expended only for capital projects; and (3) the proceeds of 1 mill of such tax levy shall be expended only for maintaining and improving existing public school houses and buildings throughout the District, including roof repair and replacement, repair and replacement of heating and air conditioning systems?

Race.SpecificTitle: Cons. Drainage Dist. No. 2 -- 6 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Consolidated Drainage District No. 2 Proposition
(Drainage Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated Drainage District No. 2 of the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a tax not to exceed six (6) mills on all property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $19,403,486, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating the drainage works within and for said District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Cons. Rec. & Community Ctr. & Playground Dist. -- 10 Mills Renewal- PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Consolidated Jefferson Recreation and Community Center
and Playground District Proposition
(Recreation Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated Jefferson Recreation and Community Center and Playground District of the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a tax not to exceed ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in said District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $26,265,426, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating recreation and other facilities in said District?
